examples.example: 每次出去游玩我们都喜欢用相机照相，记录下那些美好的瞬间。

translate.english: Every time we go out to play, we all like to take pictures with the camera to record those beautiful moments.

examples.example: 我和朋友们一起去旅游，一路上开心地谈笑、照相，留下了许多难忘的回忆。

translate.english: I went traveling with my friends, happily chatting and laughing and taking pictures along the way, leaving many unforgettable memories.

examples.example: 我们在美丽的花园里快乐地照相，定格下幸福的时刻。

translate.english: We happily take pictures in the beautiful garden to freeze the happy moments.
